gbdxtools: Python tools for using GBDXÂ¶

gbdxtools is a package for ordering imagery and launching workflows on DigitalGlobe’s GBDX platform.

gbdxtools is MIT licenced.

Installation is easy:

pip install gbdxtools

Then:

import gbdxtools

In order to use gbdxtools, you need GBDX credentials. Talk to Jordan Winkler (jordan.winkler@digitalglobe.com) to get those.

For general information on the GBDX platform and API, see here.

    • Getting your S3 bucket and prefix information
